content.content: Dear DAI Community, KXCO.IO - Knightsbridge is interested in your project and would like to have your token DAI listed with us, on our exchange. What We Would Do: List DAI token on the Knights DAO Promote DAI on our launchpad Coins Zap About KXCO.IO - Knightsbridge: KNIGHTSBRIDGE DAO is a decentral organization that spans the entire Metaverse ecosystem. KNIGHTSBRIDGE DAO includes unique modules such as the KXCO – Knights Exchange, NFT Hub, Wallet and aims to provide simple and reliable access to selected Crypto/NFTs while actively creating new classes of digital assets. KNIGHTSBRIDGE DAO prioritizes high-quality projects by vetting and rating projects. We are working to onboard external Rating Agencies to make this process even more independent and transparent. Knightsbridge has over 200,000 member accounts in over 23 different countries, with a strong Asian footprint. The design is all inclusive, for web, android, IOS, and more, prioritizing accessibility. liquidity and funding: There are no fees to get your coin listed, there are no initial payments to be made backing your coin either. For example, on traditional exchanges to have your coin listed you would need to provide all the money that could match the value the coins tally up to. On Knightsbridge, all you need to do is list the coin, we promote the coin, and roughly 30% of revenue is saved on the exchange to create the liquidity for the coins. So we would basically be creating the value as the coins were bought and sold, there’s no need to do crowdfunding just to start backing the coin before listing. If you are interested in having your token listed with us on our exchange, please get in contact with me via Email, or Telegram. I look forward to hearing back from you. Email: [email protected] Telegram: +66 083-771-0455
content.GPT-summary: The post is an advertisement from KXCO.IO - Knightsbridge, a decentralized organization that aims to provide simple and reliable access to selected Crypto/NFTs. They are interested in listing DAI token on their exchange and promoting it on their launchpad Coins Zap. They provide information about their organization and how they prioritize high-quality projects. They also explain their liquidity and funding model, which does not require any initial payments to be made backing the coin. They invite interested parties to contact them via email or Telegram.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Thank you for contacting. As both Dai and MKR are listed on many top centralized exchanges including Binance, Coinbase, and Kraken, it would be beneficial for the exchange to list them anyway. Thank you.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Thank you for your reply. Love the community here and I feel Knightsdao we bring many more supporters from South East Asia to expand this lovely community.
